To aid implementation recommendation , investigator develop 5-a-day FV mobile phone application ( app ) prototype . The basic prototype app provide information 5-a-day message , allow user input consumption , provide consumer accurate knowledge adherence recommendation . This study investigate use impact prototype app FV intakes two four week period . For significant impact health , sustain user engagement use require . Up 100 participant randomise either receive receive app , ask use app follow two four week . FV intake assess baseline , 2 week , 4 week , 8 week 12 week . Measures app use also take time point . Measures FV knowledge FV attitude also measure time point . The investigator anticipate change intake mediate change knowledge attitude .
